meanings.definition: A person who drinks alcohol excessively.
meanings.sent1: The boozers at the party were loud and rowdy.
meanings.sent2: The boozers in the bar were having a good time.
meanings.sent3: The boozers tried to dance on the table but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: The street was filled with boozers stumbling around like lost souls.
meanings.sent5: The image of the boozers laughing under the moonlight stayed with me.

meanings.definition: A place where alcoholic beverages are sold and consumed.
meanings.sent1: We decided to meet at the boozers after work for a drink.
meanings.sent2: The boozers down the street always has a lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The boozers had a special on cocktails, so we couldn't resist.
meanings.sent4: The boozers resembled a cozy haven amidst the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The neon sign of the boozers flickered invitingly in the night.
